channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Stadium Lockup
channel.desc: Highly trained law enforcement officers, private security teams and medics protect this stadium; a winter storm descends on the stadium, covering it in snow, which intensifies the night.

channel.name: A&E CA
channel.title: Stadium Lockup
channel.desc: The security team handles a range of incidents, from ejecting fans for vaping and breaking up a large scuffle in the stands, to investigating the disappearance of a young man whose worried parents and girlfriend report him missing.
